data.title: WUSA. [A Hall of Mirrors]. Screenplay by Robert Stone by Stone, Robert: (1969)
data.meta_description: 1969 - Final draft screenplay by Stone dated January 20, 1969. Stone's first screenplay, based on his 1967 first novel. The title page has been changed in pencil to show the revised title, some character names also seem to have been later changed. Mimeographed on greenish tinted paper, 176 leaves. Brad-bound in Paramount Pictures' printed cover, with cut-out title window; title written in black marker on the spine. Directed by Stuart Rosenberg, WUSA starred Paul Newman, Joanne Woodward, Anthony Perkins, and Lawrence Harvey. Near-fine condition. - WUSA. [A Hall of Mirrors]. Screenplay by Robert Stone

Shipping Terms:

Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2 LB, or .8 KG. International shipments valued at greater than $400 or weighing more than 4 lbs. must be sent by Priority Mail. If your book order is heavy or oversized, requires tracking, insurance or recorded delivery. we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
